alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene; Stone; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 9:12PM CDT until March 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Stone County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 911 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Highlandville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Rogersville, Clever, Sparta, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Fordland, Spokane, Oldfield, Elkhead, Bruner, Selmore, Keltner, Christian Center, Ponce de Leon, Linden and Boaz. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
